headline: The Top 5 Analyst Questions From Verisk’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: Verisk's first quarter was marked by consistent revenue growth and margin expansion, with the market responding positively to these results. Management highlighted broad-based gains in subscription revenue, driven by increased adoption across underwriting and claims solutions, as well as the successful rollout of new analytic tools and platforms.
